availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Bettes Williams in Bracken County on March 16, 1850. Father of Thomas Williams, James Williams, Edmund Williams, and Amanda Williams. Farmer in Bracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bracken County, Eastern District, p. 27.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Film 000344098, Bracken County, March 16, 1850 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Backen County Marriages, Film #000344098, p. 914 of 1299 on microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
